summary: Sabre Tusk Longhouse, an small abandoned Orc Stronghold, in which the natives took their rage against the giants in Fallstone Cave. Plenty of Storage, 6 mannequins, forge, and barricade fence all around.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Barbarian Longhouse

[/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=3]An Small Abandoned Orc Stronghold, fitting for a lone Barbarian Character. Plenty of Storage if any knows my home mods, this is one is not full of empty containers on every wall haha. But enough to satisfy collectors.

6 Mannequins, more for décor with a few gear chests.
2 Collection chests, and knapsacks.
Full Forge Station under an Awning.
A Stable for your horse.

Hearth fire DLC Required

The key  is located at Malacath Statue in Giants Grove through Fallstone Cave. in a strongbox. Need to be level 10, and do the Largashbur Daedric Quest to get to Malacath Statue!!

[/size][/color][size=3][color=#ff0000]FAQS
[/color][color=#ffffff]Where are the Enchanting and Alchemy Stations?
---This is for a Barbarian Type Character, I will not put one at this moment. Until I feel Im almost complete with everything else. Then I will add them as an optional file.

Mannequins??
---Always a pain. but works if you go outside and back in resets.

Followers, or NPCs?
---This is an abandoned Orc Stronghold, basically the orcs in this small camp went to Fallstone Cave to fight the Giants and lost. As a reward Malacath grants you a key to the home, so you may build your own. ---In which as I will add Optional files to add sections of other longhouses to add to the base, by expanding the area.

[/color][/size]
author: Jrew

files.name: Barbarian LongHouse
files.changelogHtml:
Added a few details as lighting.
fixed up some walls
added a cave but not usable ATM!!!

files.name: Barbarian LongHouse
files.changelogHtml:
Added a new tower (Navmeshed)
retweaked the landscaping and décor around the stronghold. (Floating chop block no more) :)
Added spikes on the back ledge like the front.
Moved the cave to the back ledge, and put a trap door. (No use yet)
added some barricades.

Inside moved the treasure chests and sacks in the display room, and put a bed night stand and chest for a follower. That is pretty much it.

Follower approved as well( Big thumbs up on that.)
